title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1750.16 - Final notification
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1750.16 - Final notification

State Regulations

At least 7 but not more than 10 days before the effective
date of the dissolution of the housing company, or closing date, the housing
company shall send a notice, to the parties specified in section
1750.4
(a) of this

Part, of the anticipated date of such dissolution and the name and address of
the transferee, if any. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
1750.16

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
